short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your MEPCO Electricity bill by entering reference number

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you yet to receive your MEPCO electricity bill or have you lost it? No worries, you can use this extension to check MEPCO bill online for free. You just need to enter your 14-digit reference number. Your reference number is printed on your bill copy.
